content:
WindowMessage Delegate

Definition

Represents a delegate that is used to reference the method that will handle window messages.

In this Article

public delegate void WindowMessage(int msgId, IntPtr parameter1, IntPtr parameter2);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
WindowMessage
